void Sched::Redistribution::compute_distant (  ) 

Compute communications schema. Should call after bind_src() and bind_dest()

bool Sched::Redistribution::gdid_is_in_recv_group ( DFG::GlobalData::Id  gdid  ) 

Return true if the GlobalData with Id gdid should be received ; otherwise false. Should be called after bind_src() and bind_dest()

bool Sched::Redistribution::gdid_is_in_send_group ( DFG::GlobalData::Id  gdid  ) 

Return true if the GlobalData with Id gdid will be send in the computed communications schema ; otherwise false. Should called after compute_distant().
